# AI Virality Index

> Real-time virality index (0–100) for the world's leading AI models, updated daily.

AI Virality Index tracks how 7 major AI models trend across the internet by aggregating data from 6 independent signal sources into a single composite score.

## Models Tracked

- ChatGPT (OpenAI)
- Gemini (Google)
- Claude (Anthropic)
- Perplexity (Perplexity AI)
- DeepSeek (DeepSeek)
- Grok (xAI)
- Copilot (Microsoft)

## Index Components

The virality score (0–100) is computed from 6 weighted components:

- **T — Search Interest**: Google Trends search volume
- **S — Social**: YouTube video activity + Hacker News discussions
- **G — GitHub**: Stars, forks, and issues on official repositories
- **N — News**: Global media coverage via GDELT
- **D — Dev Adoption**: Daily npm + PyPI SDK download counts
- **M — Mindshare**: Wikipedia pageview volume

## Scoring Modes

**Trading Mode** (optimized for momentum signals):
`VI = 0.18×T + 0.28×S + 0.15×G + 0.12×N + 0.15×D + 0.12×M`

**Content Mode** (optimized for content creators):
`VI = 0.25×T + 0.35×S + 0.05×G + 0.20×N + 0.05×D + 0.10×M`

## Links

- Website: https://ai-virality-index.vercel.app
- Dashboard: https://ai-virality-index.vercel.app/dashboard
- API (free tier): https://ai-virality-index.vercel.app/api/v1/index/latest
- Full data for LLMs: https://ai-virality-index.vercel.app/llms-full.txt
- Blog: https://ai-virality-index.vercel.app/blog
- Methodology: https://ai-virality-index.vercel.app/blog/what-is-ai-virality-index
